translations: n．说法，用语：特定领域或社群中的特定说法或用词。

sentences.sentence: As to the definition of the current Chinese character standardization provide the narrow sensed, broad sensed and the most broad sensed parlances, as well as the areas of the application of them.
sentences.translation: 现行汉字规范化的定义，本文提出了狭义的、广义的和最广义的三种说法，并分别说明了适用的范围。
